content.raw:
No one is reviewing that ign-math pull request right now, so I don't expect it to land this month.

Would it be better to point to the branch instead of the pull request? Or are you uncomfortable with pointing to unreviewed code?

I thought it would be helpful to have a hands-on utility for converting between representations of rotation. I would have preferred code for an interpreted language, but I think this is a useful alternative.
